loan.name: Kemny Jocaryn
loan.use: to buy supplies such as calcium, zinc, boron, etc. to improve his coffee trees' nutrition.
loan.description:
Kemny is 30 years old and has good principles. He manages a 4.5-hectare farm of which 1.4 hectares are used to grow coffee. He manages it according to the criteria set forth in the FLO certification. He lives in a faraway community in northern Nicaragua where he lives with his wife and son.

As a child he did some work on his parents' farm and now he faces a new challenge every year with his own farm. He will use the loan to buy supplies such as calcium, zinc, boron, etc. to improve his coffee trees' nutrition.

This is the first loan he processes through PAC.
loan.whySpecial: It allows farmers to plant trees needed to shade coffee plants.
